summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4257 for the improvement of 17th Avenue South, from the south line of Sunny Slope Addition to Graham Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50545, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
